name: Zig Zag Mana
description:
Zig Zag Mana

Avoid touching the borders to trigger a Game Over.

WebGL Demo:
Press Space or click the game to switch directions.
WebGL cannot save because does not support binary formatter, because of that I have unlocked all the colors of the game.

Android - Unlock new colors.
- Leaderboards.
- Achievements.
